name: Acrux TR GTX Hiking Boots - Women's

features: Vibram® MegaGrip™ rubber compound is durable and grippy
GORE-TEX provides waterproof and breathable performance.
Molded rubber toe cap provides protection
Injected EVA Midsole delivers longwearing cushion and comfort
TPU chassis at the midfoot and forefoot provides stability and torsional rigidity
SuperFabric® micro-plate technology delivers outstanding abrasion resistance for remarkably little weight
